import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' /* ----------------COMPONENTS------------------------ */ import PtopBar from './PtopBar' import CategoryProducts from './CategoryProducts.js' import Filter from './filter/Filter.js' /* -------------------------------------------------- */ const ProductArea = ({Data,Index, Amount,array,fil}) =>{ const nums = array let txtJXS = [] const FilteredData = Data.forEach((e,index)=>{ const FILTRADOS = e.text.filter(()=>{ if(Data[index].tag === fil.Clicked){ return Data[index].tag } }) return FILTRADOS }) console.log(FilteredData) const Repeater = () =>{ for(let i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++){ let j = 0 txtJXS[i] = new Array() txtJXS[i][j] = new Array() Data.forEach((datos, index) => { if (index < nums[i]*(j+1) ){ let aux = index-(nums[i])*(j) txtJXS[i][j][aux] = (

{datos.name}

{datos.price}
) }else{ j++ txtJXS[i][j] = new Array() txtJXS[i][j][0]=(

{datos.name}

{datos.price}
) } }) } } Repeater() const showItems = {text:txtJXS[Amount][Index[0]-1] } return(
) } const mapFunction = state => ({ Data : state.PAReducer.PADate, Index: state.PAGReducer.pagination, Amount: state.amountReducer.Amount, array : state.amountReducer.array, fil: state.filterReducer }) export default connect(mapFunction)(ProductArea)
